title: How to Clean a Hairbrush
summary: Using shampoo and warm water to clean a hairbrush.
content: To clean a hairbrush using shampoo and warm water, fill a bowl with warm water and add a few drops of shampoo. Swirl the shampoo in the water to create suds. Submerge the hairbrush in the soapy water and let it soak for at least 15 minutes. Use a toothbrush or comb to remove any hair or residue from the bristles and base. Rinse the hairbrush thoroughly with clean water and let it air dry.
